move on.'' Mr David Cameron said his aide had done an excellent job- and pointed out that Mr Andy Coulson had resigned from the News of the World over the phone hacking claims. He said: I feel he has been punished twice for the same offence.`` I choose to judge him by the work he has done for me, for the Government and the country. Mr Andy Coulson , 43, left the News of the World in January 2007 after its then-Royal editor Clive Goodman and private investigator Glenn Mulcaire were jailed for hacking into mobile voicemails.
